definition: A term commonly used to describe a dietary preference or lifestyle choice that excludes the consumption of meat and fish, focusing instead on plant-based foods.

examples.german: Das Restaurant bietet viele vegetarische Optionen.
examples.english: The restaurant offers many vegetarian options.

examples.german: Meine Schwester ist seit einem Jahr vegetarisch.
examples.english: My sister has been vegetarian for a year.

examples.german: Ich habe gestern ein vegetarisches Gericht gekocht.
examples.english: I cooked a vegetarian dish yesterday.
